title: Yokohama Meibutsu: Otoko Katayama-gumi!
synopsis: The city of Yokohama has become a lawless district for biker gangs. One particular gang, the "Crazy Babies", have a 17 year old leader called Hiromi Katayama that is famous throughout the entire Kanagawa alliance as being a strong fighter with a devout sense of morality. However, when a young rookie by the name of Toshi Ikeda wants in, he swears to Katayama that he will uphold the ideals of the Crazy Babies and vows to not fight with anybody for his first probationary month within the gang or else forfeit his chance to join the gang.
voices: ['Horiuchi, Kenyuu', 'Nanba, Keiichi', 'Mizutani, Yuuko', 'Hori, Hideyuki', 'Shioya, Yoku', 'Kosugi, Juurouta']
staff: [['Matsuura, Noriyoshi', ['Sound Director']], ['Yazawa, Akira', ['Original Creator']], ['Yamamoto, Masafumi', ['Animation Director', ' Character Design']], ['Satou, Hiroaki', ['Art Director']]]
